title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reflects on the career of Rob Gronkowski after he announced his retirement for the second time and what this says about the state of the Patriots since the departure of Gronk and Tom Brady. Find out why Colin compares Kyrie Irving to cryptocurrency as questions about his future with the Nets come to surface. He also has serious questions about one of the top prospects in Thursday's NBA draft. Plus, Auburn head coach Bruce Pearl joins the show to share what makes his former player Jabari Smith special and worthy of being a top pick in the NBA draft. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
